alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 5:31AM AKST until November 29 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. South winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase late tonight and snow and blowing snow will develop causing low visibility in passes. Winds will decrease Wednesday afternoon, and blowing snow will become less severe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
